extendedInfo.description: Hangman, now especially for your little genius! A fun way to become the spelling whiz.Hangman Kids is an innovative adaptation of classic hangman, It's has all the stuff your kids needs to learn and we have made this learning process fun.With their favourite animal from Animal Kingdom        " _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _   Hint : I have a long trunk, Guess who am I?"to Fruits, Vegetable, place to his favorite Cartoon character.Theyâll learn to spell:Fruits âApple, Banana, Grapes Strawberries etcAnimals â Bear, Horse, Tiger, Hog, Panda, Bee etc Cartoons â Mickey Mouse, Homer Simpson, Popeye, Garfield etcDownload now and let this game be your fun way to help them learn. It might even help you break the addiction for television/video games.;) As parents you might get hooked too. We bet it will take you back to school. Do let us know who can guess the words faster? You or the Little Master?According to a survey: 'Favorite classic game on Mobile? Chess, Sudoku, Hangman or Crossword'Hangman won hands down, people of all ages love it. It's one of the best Free Game and most popular word game on Google play, quickly making it to the top of most downloaded Game list. Everyoneâs favorite word game â¦ better than crossword, scrabble, word search. Enjoy the word challenge with or without friends.We are always eager to improve so do give us your feedback!Like us and even play on facebook https://www.facebook.com/SpiceHangman,

reviews.title: Fun app
reviews.comment: This is a fun game for me and my son. It would be cool if there were different age level settings so all kids would enjoy. The clues are too advanced for my 7 year old to play alone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Keeps everyone interested - great fun & educational too, BRILLIANT!
reviews.author: Mandy Bell

reviews.title: Game is great but...
reviews.comment: I reviewed this for my kids and kept seeing ads for singles and need a date. Game is great if ads change we would download. Have to uninstall. :(
reviews.author: Rachele Cumbie

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Hangman kids is a great game and I really have fun when I played it with my students. It also help them to improve their vocabulary
reviews.author: Lim Mery

reviews.comment: Cool game lots of fun and words are pretty much up to date so easy to solve even for my four year old.\tExcellent game
reviews.author: Selene R

reviews.title: Works well on s2
reviews.comment: Great for kids. Would be good if the clues were spoken out for the younger ones who can\'t read afraid words. Works well on galaxy s2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I really like it
reviews.comment: My husband n kids play 2gether great family pass time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for young children
reviews.comment: Children under 10 would struggle to answer questions without help the clues can be quite hard my 8 year old has asked for help on nearly all of them
reviews.author: kirsty smith

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: My son & I play this a lot while waiting for appoints. We play it at home too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome version of the classic hangman game!Downloaded it for my kids,and they luv it,including me.A great way for your children to learn new words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HANGMAN KIDS
reviews.comment: Is very addictive ...just like the MAIN one....and very enjoyable :))
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it great way to waste time and test your brain
reviews.author: Mariah Shinn

reviews.title: alwayscocacola532
reviews.comment: My daughter LOVES THIS GAME!!!! She says, IT\'S COOL!!!! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but a little classic.
reviews.comment: I love remembering these old classic cartoons but my son doesnt so its hard for him. so i play it and then introduce him to the classics. either way its win.
reviews.author: Tara Fincher

reviews.title: whoever said you\'re wrong
reviews.comment: fun love it sexy amazinghot
reviews.author: Teddy Jones

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: This is great but I strangly saw south park
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kids hangman
reviews.comment: Good game ok to install.  Good job Creator :)
reviews.author: Denise Seabolt

reviews.title: Application can make phone calls.
reviews.comment: Game seems OK so far BUT watch out as one the required permissions appears to allow the application to make phone calls without phone owners intervention.  This seems excessive and unnecessary.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Toss up.
reviews.comment: Some of the clues r to old for younger kids and some r not discriptive enough. Over all tho the kiddo\'s love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Teaching Tool
reviews.comment: My four year old\'s reading and SPELLING has progressed wonderfully as a result of playing this game!
reviews.author: Beverly Hartman
